name: Asthma, Symptoms of Exacerbation
description:
One or more of the following:
- Cough increases in frequency and severity
- Sputum production increases in volume and/or changes character
- Dyspnea worse

name: Asthma, New Symptoms
shortname: New Symptoms / History of present Illness

name: Asthma, Physical Examination Details
description:
GENERAL - visibly dyspneaic
NEURO
-use of the accessory respiratory musc
HEENT
CARDIO - murmur - regular
LUNGS - wheeze
ABDOMEN
EXTREMITIES - edema (CHF)
SKIN - signs of atopy

name: Asthma, Diagnostic Result
description:
DIAGNOSTICS TODAY
Consider CXR IF diagnosis is unclear (eg, pneumonia, pneumothorax)
, hemoptysis, fever > 1 week –
